values.name: NO
values.description: A member's response expressing they won't attend

values.name: NO_SHOW
values.description: An organized flagged RSVP for a member that was expected to attend but didn't

values.name: WAITLIST
values.description: A member's response expressing an intent to attend to an over capacity event

values.name: YES
values.description: A member's response expressing an intent to attend

values.name: YES_PENDING_PAYMENT
values.description: A member's expressed intent to go to an paid event before payment has been processed
